description:
### Digit Distance Number

Function calculates the digit distance number of a given number. Digit distance between two digits, a and b, is absolute difference of a and b. Digit distance number of a number abc... (where a, b, c... are digits of given number) is (b-a)(c-b)... (where (x) denotes concatenation). For example, if n = 2744, the digit distance number will be 530.

Input: A single integer value.
Output: The calculated digit distance number.

Example:

``` digitDistanceNumber(2744) // 530 ```
